text.h2: text-3xl leading-8 tracking-tight sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl text-current

button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center border border-transparent text-base font-bold whitespace-nowrap rounded-full focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500
button.main_navigation: inline-flex items-center justify-center py-1 px-2 font-bold border-2 border-secondary-600 text-secondary-600 bg-white transition-bg hover:bg-secondary-100 hover:bg-secondary-100
